name: Config 2022 Name Badge - Tiffany Loué
description:
Designer for more than 10 years, my vocation is to transform usage into experience.

As an artist with a geeky soul, I trained as a fullstack web developer in order to collaborate efficiently with technical teams.

Today, I combine my graphic and technological skills to achieve my missions as a digital designer: interface design, visual identity creation, motion design, video, illustration...
